import styles from './Card.module.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCircleXmark } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { connect } from 'react-redux' const Card = ({ id, name, image, onClose }) => { const nameFit = name.length > 15 ? `${name.substring(0, 15)}...` : name return (

{nameFit}

Click para m√°s info

) } export default connect(null, null)(Card)
